title: Mary Had A Little Lamb
body: Mary had a little lamb, little lamb, little lamb, Mary had a little lamb Whose fleece was white as snow.

title: Itsy Bitsy Spider
body: The itsy bitsy spider crawled up the water spout. Down came the rain, and washed the spider out. Out came the sun, and dried up all the rain, and the itsy bitsy spider went up the spout again
